amendment.description: To provide emergency agricultural disaster assistance.

action.text: Amendment SA 5205 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 5205.
The emergency designation within amendment SA 5205 was stricken.

Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 5205 (the section within the amendment regarding an emergency designation) rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 38. Record Vote Number: 271.
Point of order that an emergency designation within the amendment violates the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 5205.
Amendment SA 5205 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S11143-11156) To provide emergency agricultural disaster assistance.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 5205 (the section within the amendment regarding an emergency designation) rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 38. Record Vote Number: 271.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5205 proposed by Senator Conrad.
